title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Cook the bacon in a pan.
Combine spaghetti with bacon and remove from heat.
Quickly mix in egg mixture and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Add chicken to sauce and simmer.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
